GSP33bhgsbh_u:241: karma-saṃnyāse prāpte 'pi karmaṇā sahaiva saṃsiddhim āsthitāḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:247: etam evārthaṃ vakṣyati bhagavān sattva-śuddhaye karma kurvanti iti /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:248: sva-karmaṇā tam abhyarcya siddhiṃ vindati mānavaḥ ity uktvā siddhiṃ prāptasya punar-jñāna-niṣṭhāṃ vakṣyati -- siddhiṃ prāpto yathā brahma ity ādinā //
GSP33bhgsbh_u:249: tasmād gītā-śāstre kevalād eva tattva-jñānān mokṣa-prāptiḥ na karma-samuccitāt iti niścito 'rthaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:251: tathā prakaraṇaśo vibhajya tatra tatra darśayiṣyāmaḥ //
GSP33bhgsbh_u:252_0: tatraiva dharma-saṃmūḍha-cetaso mithyā-jñānavato mahati śoka-sāgare nimagnasya arjunasya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:252_1: anyatrātma-jñānād uddharaṇam apaśyan bhagavān vāsudevaḥ tataḥ kṛpayā arjunam uddidhārayiṣuḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:254: aśocyān anvaśocas tvaṃ prajñā-vādāṃś ca bhāṣase /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:258: tān aśocyān anvaśoco 'nuśocitavān asi te mriyante man-nimittam,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:259: ahaṃ tair vinābhūtaḥ kiṃ kariṣyāmi rājya-sukhādinā iti /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:260: tvaṃ prajñā-vādān prajñāvatāṃ buddhimatāṃ vādāṃś ca vacanāni ca bhāṣase /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:261: tad etat mauḍhyaṃ pāṇḍityaṃ ca viruddham ātmani darśayasi unmatta iva ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:265: paṇḍā ātma-viṣayā buddhir yeṣāṃ te hi paṇḍitāḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:267: paramārthatas tu tān nityān aśocyān anuśocasi,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:272: na tv evāhaṃ jātu nāsaṃ na tvaṃ neme janādhipāḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:273: na caiva na bhaviṣyāmaḥ sarve vayam ataḥ param //BhG_2.12//
GSP33bhgsbh_u:274: na tv eva jātu kadācid ahaṃ nāsam kintv āsam eva /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:275: atīteṣu dehotpatti-vināśeṣu ghaṭādiṣu viyad iva nitya eva aham āsam ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:278: tathā neme janādhipā āsan kintv āsann eva /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:281: sarve vayam ato 'smād deha-vināśāt param uttara-kāle 'pi /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:282: triṣv api kāleṣu nityā ātma-svarūpeṇa ity arthaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:286: tatra katham iva nitya ātmeti dṛṣṭāntam āha -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:287: dehino 'smin yathā dehe kaumāraṃ yauvanaṃ jarā /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:288: tathā dehāntara-prāptir dhīras tatra na muhyati //BhG_2.13//
GSP33bhgsbh_u:290: tasya dehino dehavataḥ ātmano 'smin vartamāne dehā yathā yena prakāreṇa kaumāraṃ kumāra-bhāvo bālyāvasthā,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:297: tathā tadvad eva dehād anyo deho dehāntaram,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:298: tasya prāptiḥ dehāntara-prāptiḥ avikriyasyaiva ātmana ity arthaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:299: dhīro dhīmān tatraivaṃ sati na muhyati na moham āpadyate //BhGS_2.13// ==============================
GSP33bhgsbh_u:301: yadyapy ātma-vināśa-nimitto moho na saṃbhavati nitya ātmā iti vijānataḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:304: ity etad arjunasya vacanam āśaṅkaya bhagavān āha -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:307: mātrā ābhiḥ mīyante śabdādaya iti śrotrādīni indriyāṇi /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:309: te śītoṣṇasukha-duḥkha-dāḥ śītam uṣṇaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca prayacchantīti /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:310: athavā spṛśyanta iti sparśā viṣayāḥ śabdādayaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:314: sukha-duḥkhe punaḥ niyata-rūpe yato na vyabhicarataḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:316: yasmāt te mātrā-sparśādayaḥ āgamāpāyinaḥ āgamāpāyaśīlāḥ tasmāt anityāḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:318: teṣu harṣaṃ viṣādaṃ vā mā kārṣīḥ ity arthaḥ //BhGS_2.14// ==============================
GSP33bhgsbh_u:320: śītoṣṇādīn sahataḥ kiṃ syād iti śṛṇu ---
GSP33bhgsbh_u:321: yaṃ hi na vyathayanty ete puruṣaṃ puruṣarṣabha /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:323_0: yaṃ hi puruṣaṃ same duḥkha-sukhe yasya taṃ sama-duḥkha-sukhaṃ sukha-duḥkha-prāptau
GSP33bhgsbh_u:323_1: harṣa-viṣāda-rahitaṃ dhīraṃ dhīmantaṃ na vyathayanti na cālayanti nityātma-darśanāt
GSP33bhgsbh_u:324: sa nityātma-svarūpa-darśa-niṣṭho dvandva-sahiṣṇuḥ amṛtatvāya amṛta-bhāvāya mokṣāyety arthaḥ kalpate samartho bhavati //BhGS_2.15// ==============================
GSP33bhgsbh_u:326: itaś ca śoka-mohau akṛtvā śītoṣṇādi-sahanaṃ yuktam, yasmāt ---
GSP33bhgsbh_u:327: nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:328: ubhayor api dṛṣṭo 'ntas tv anayos tattva-darśibhiḥ //BhG_2.16//
GSP33bhgsbh_u:329: na asato 'vidyamānasya śītoṣṇādeḥ sa-kāraṇasya na vidyate nāsti bhāvo bhavanam astitā //
GSP33bhgsbh_u:330: na hi śītoṣṇādi sa-kāraṇaṃ pramāṇair nirūpyamāṇaṃ vastu sambhavati /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:333: yathā ghaṭādi-saṃsthānaṃ cakṣuṣā nirūpyamāṇaṃ mṛd-vyatirekeṇānupalabdher asat /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:336: kāryasya ghaṭādeḥ mṛd-ādi-kāraṇasya ca tat-kāraṇa-vyatirekeṇānupalabdher asattvam //
GSP33bhgsbh_u:340: yad-viṣayā buddhir na vyabhicarati, tat sat /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:343: sarvatra dve buddhī sarvair upalabhyete samānādhikaraṇe na nīlotpalavat,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:354: ghaṭe vinaṣṭe ghaṭa-buddhau vyabhicarantyāṃ sad-buddhir api vyabhicaratīti cet na /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:357: sad-buddhivat ghaṭa-buddhir api ghaṭāntarā dṛśyata iti cet, na /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:359: sad-buddhir api naṣṭe ghaṭe na dṛśyata iti cet, na /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:361: sad-buddhir viśeṣaṇa-viṣayā satī viśeṣyābhāve viśeṣaṇānupapattau kiṃ-viṣayā syāt ?
GSP33bhgsbh_u:363: ekādhikaraṇatvaṃ ghaṭādi-viśeṣyābhāve na yuktam iti cet, na /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:364: idam udakam iti marīcy-ādau anyatarābhāve 'pi sāmānādhikaraṇya-darśanāt //
GSP33bhgsbh_u:365: tasmād dehāder dvandvasya ca sa-kāraṇasya asato na vidyate bhāva iti /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:366: tathā sataś ca ātmano 'bhāvo 'vidyamānatā na vidyate,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:368: evam ātmānātmanoḥ sad-asatoḥ ubhayor api dṛṣṭaḥ upalabdho 'nto nirṇayaḥ sat sad eva,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:371: tad iti sarva-nāma sarvaṃ ca brahma,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:375: tad draṣṭuṃ śīlaṃ yeṣāṃ te tattva-darśinaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:377_0: tvam api tattva-darśināṃ dṛṣṭim āśritya śokaṃ mohaṃ ca hitvā śītoṣṇādīni niyatāniyata-rūpāṇi
GSP33bhgsbh_u:377_1: dvandvāni vikāro 'yam asann eva marīci-jalavan mithyāvabhāsate iti manasi niścitya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:379: kiṃ punas tat yat sad eva sarvadaiva astīti / ucyate ---
GSP33bhgsbh_u:380: avināśi tu tad viddhi yena sarvam idaṃ tatam /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:381: vināśam avyayasyāsya na kaścit kartum arhati //BhG_2.17//
GSP33bhgsbh_u:385: kim ? yena sarvam idaṃ jagat tataṃ vyāptaṃ sad-ākhyena brahmaṇā sākāśam,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:388: avyayasya na vyeti upacayāpacayau na yāti iti avyayaṃ tasya avyayasya /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:389: naitat sadākhyaṃ brahma svena rūpeṇa vyeti vyabhicarati,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:395: ato 'vyayasya asya brahmaṇaḥ vināśaṃ na kaścit kartum arhati,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:396: na kaścit atmānaṃ vināśayituṃ śaknoti īśvaro 'pi /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:400: kiṃ punas tad asat yat svātma-sattāṃ vyabhicaratīti, ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:403: antaḥ vināśaḥ vidyate yeṣāṃ te antavantaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:404: yathā mṛgatṛṣṇikādau sad-buddhiḥ anuvṛttā pramāṇanirūpaṇānte vicchidyate,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:406: tathā ime dehāḥ svapnamāyādehādivaca antavantaḥ nityasya śarīriṇaḥ śarīravato 'nāśino 'prameyarya ātmano 'ntavanta iti uktāḥ vivekibhirity arthaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:409: yathā deho bhasmībhūto 'darśanaṃ gato naṣṭa ucyate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:410: vidyamāno 'pi yathā anyathā pariṇato vyādhyādi-yukto jāto naṣṭa ucyate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:411: tatra nityasya ṭh anāśinaḥ iti dvividhenāpi nāśena asaṃbandho 'syety arthaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:412: anyathā pṛthivyādivad api nityatvaṃ syāt ātmanaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:413: tat mā bhūditi nityasya anāśinaḥ ityāha /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:414: aprameyamya na prameyasya pratyakṣādi-pramāṇaiḥ aparicchādyasyety arthaḥ //
GSP33bhgsbh_u:419: sirā hi ātmani pramātari pramitsoḥ pramāṇānveṣaṇā bhavati /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:420: na hi pūrvam itthamaham iti ātmānamapramāya pa cāt prameyaparicchādāya pravartate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:421: na hi ātmā nāma kasyacit aprasiddho bhavati /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:422: śāstraṃ tu antyaṃ pramāṇam atad-dharmādhyāropaṇa-mātra-nivartakatvena pramāṇatvam ātmanaḥ pratipadyate,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:424: tathā ca śrutiḥ --- yat sākṣād aparokṣād brahma ya ātmā sarvāntaraḥ [BAU 3.4.1] iti /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:425: yasmād evaṃ nityo 'vikriyaś cātmā tasmād yudhyasva,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:426: yuddhād uparamaṃ mā kārṣīḥ ity arthaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:428: yuddhe pravṛtta eva hi asau śoka-moha-pratibaddhaḥ tūṣṇīm āste /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:430: tasmād yudhyasva iti anuvāda-mātram, na vidhiḥ //BhGS_2.18// ==============================
GSP33bhgsbh_u:433: na pravartakam ity etasyārthasya sākṣi-bhūte ṛcau ānināya bhagavān /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:434: yat tu manyase yuddhā bhīṣmādayo mayā hanyante aham eva teṣāṃ hantā iti,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:436: ya enaṃ vetti hantāraṃ yaś cainaṃ manyate hatam /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:437: ubhau tau na vijānīto nāyaṃ hanti na hanyate //BhG_2.19//
GSP33bhgsbh_u:438: ya enaṃ prakṛtaṃ dehinaṃ vetti vijānāti hantāraṃ hanana-kriyāyāḥ kartāraṃ ya ca enam anyo manyate hataṃ deha-hananena hato 'ham iti hanana-kriyāyāḥ karma-bhūtam /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:439: tau ubhau na vijānītaḥ na jñātavantau avivekena ātmānam /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:440: hantā ahaṃ, hato 'smy aham iti deha-hananena ātmānam ahaṃ pratyaya-viṣayaṃ yau vijānītaḥ tau ātma-svarūpānabhijñau ity arthaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:441: yasmāt na ayam atmā hanti na hanana-kriyāyāḥ kartā bhavati,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:442: na ca hanyate na ca karma bhavatīty arthaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:447: nāyaṃ bhūtvā bhavitā vā na bhūyaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:451: jani-lakṣaṇā vastu-vikriyā na ātmano vidyate ity arthaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:454: na mriyate ca iti antyā vināśa-lakṣaṇā vikriyā pratiṣidhyate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:455: kadācic chabdaḥ sarva-vikriyā-pratiṣedhaiḥ saṃbadhyate -- na kadācit jāyate,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:457: yasmāt ayam ātmā bhūtvā bhavana-kriyām anubhūya paścāt abhavitā abhāvaṃ gantā na bhūyaḥ punaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:459: yo hi bhūtvā na bhavitā sa mriyata ity ucyate lokā /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:460: vā-śabdāt na-śabdāc ca ayam ātmā abhūtvā vā bhavitā dehavat na bhūyaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:462: yo hi abhūtvā bhavitā sa jāyata ity ucyate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:466: yasmāt na mriyate tasmāt nityaś ca /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:467: yadyapi ādy-antayor vikriyayoḥ pratiṣedhe sarvā vikriyāḥ pratiṣiddhā bhavanti,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:468: tathāpi madhya-bhāvinīnāṃ vikriyāṇāṃ sva-śabdair eva pratiṣedhaḥ kartavyo 'nuktānām api yauvanādi-samasta-vikriyāṇāṃ pratiṣedho yathā syāt ity āha-- śāśvata ity ādinā /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:475: apakṣaya-viparītāpi vṛddhi-lakṣaṇā vikriyā pratiṣidhyate --- purāṇa iti /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:476: yo hi avayavāgamena upacīyate sa vardhate abhinava iti ca ucyate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:477: ayaṃ tu ātmā niravayavatvāt purāpi nava eveti purāṇaḥ na vardhate ity arthaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:482: asmin mantre ṣaḍ-bhāva-vikārā laukika-vastu-vikriyā ātmani pratiṣidhyante /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:484: yasmād evaṃ tasmāt ubhau tau na vijānītaḥ iti pūrveṇa mantreṇa asya saṃbandhaḥ //BhGS_2.20// ==============================
GSP33bhgsbh_u:486: ya enaṃ vetti hantāram ityanena mantreṇa hanana-kriyāyāḥ kartā karma ca na bhavati iti pratijñāya,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:487: na jāyate ity anena avikriyatvaṃ hetum uktvā pratijñātārtham upasaṃharati--
GSP33bhgsbh_u:488: vedāvināśinaṃ nityaṃ ya enam ajam avyayam /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:489: kathaṃ sa puruṣaḥ pārtha kaṃ ghātayati hanti kam //BhG_2.21//
GSP33bhgsbh_u:490: veda vijānāti avināśinam antya-bhāva-vikāra-rahitaṃ nityaṃ vipariṇāma-rahitaṃ yo veda iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:491: enaṃ pūrveṇa matreṇokta-lakṣaṇam ajaṃ janma-rahitam avyayam apakṣaya-rahitaṃ kathaṃ kena prakāreṇa sa vidvān puruṣo 'dhikṛtaḥ hanti hanana-kriyāṃ karoti,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:494: na kathaṃcit kaṃcit ghātayati iti ubhayatra ākṣepaḥ evārthaḥ praśnārthāsaṃbhavāt /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:495: hetv-arthasya ca avikriyatvasya tulyatvāt viduṣaḥ sarva-karma-pratiṣedha eva prakaraṇārtho 'bhipreto bhagavatā /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:497: viduṣaḥ kaṃ karmāsaṃbhave hetu-viśeṣaṃ paśyan karmāṇy ākṣipati bhagavān kathaṃ sa puruṣaḥ iti /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:502: na hi avikriyaṃ sthāṇuṃ viditavataḥ karma na saṃbhavati iti cet, na /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:505: ataḥ pāriśeṣyāt asaṃhata ātmā vidvān avikriyaḥ iti tasya viduṣaḥ karmāsaṃbhavāt ākṣepo yuktaḥ kathaṃ sa puruṣaḥ iti /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:506: yathā buddhyādy āhṛtasya śabdādy-arthasya avikriya eva san buddhi-vṛtty-aviveka-vijñānena avidyayā upalabdhā ātmā kalpyate,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:507: evam eva ātmānātma-viveka-jñānena buddhi-vṛttyā vidyā asatya-rūpayaiva paramārthato 'vikriya eva ātmā vidvān ucyate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:508: viduṣaḥ karmāsaṃbhava-vacanāt yāni karmāṇi śāstreṇa vidhīyante tāni aviduṣo vihitāni iti bhagavato niścayo 'vagamyate //
GSP33bhgsbh_u:511: tatra aviduṣaḥ karmāṇi vidhīyante na viduṣaḥ iti viśeṣo nopapadyate iti cet, na /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:513: agnihotrādi-vidhy-artha-jñānottara-kālam agnihotrādi-karma aneka-sādhanopasaṃhāra-pūrvakam anuṣṭheyaṃ kartā aham,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:514: mama kartavyam ity evaṃ prakāra-vijñānavato 'viduṣaḥ yathā anuṣṭheyaṃ bhavati,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:515: na tu tathā na jāyate ity ādy ātma-svarupa-vidhy-artha-jñānottara-kāla-bhāvi kiṃcid anuṣṭheyaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:517: nāhaṃ bhoktā ity ādy ātmaikatvākartṛtvādi-viṣaya-jñānāt nānyad utpadyate iti eṣa viśeṣa upapadyate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:518: yaḥ punaḥ kartā aham iti vetti ātmānam,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:519: tasya mama idaṃ kartavyam iti avaśyaṃbhāvinī buddhiḥ syāt /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:522: sa ca avidvān ubhau tau na vijānītaḥ iti vacanāt viśeṣitasya ca viduṣaḥ karmākṣepa-vacanāt kathaṃ sa puruṣaḥ iti /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:523: tasmāt viśeṣitasya avikriyātma-darśinaḥ viduṣaḥ mumukṣo ca sarva-karma-saṃnyāse eva adhikāraḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:524: ata eva bhagavān nārāyaṇaḥ sāṃkhyān viduṣo 'viduṣa ca karmiṇaḥ pravibhajya dve niṣṭhe grāhayati-jñāna-yogena sāṃkhyānāṃ karma-yogena yoginām iti /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:525: tathā ca putrāya āha bhagavān vyāsaḥ - dvāv imāv atha panthānau [MahāŚā 241.6] ity ādi /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:526: tathā ca kriyā-pathaś caiva purastāt paścāt saṃnyāsaś ca iti /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:527: etam eva vibhāgaṃ punaḥ punar darśayiṣyati bhagavān --- atattvavit ahaṃkāra-vimūḍhātmā kartāham iti manyate,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:530: tathā ca sarva-karmāṇi manasā saṃnyasyāste ityādi //
GSP33bhgsbh_u:531: tatra kecit paṇḍitaṃ-manyā vadanti --- janmādi-ṣaḍ-bhāva-vikriyā-rahito 'vikriyo 'kartā eko 'ham ātmā iti na kasyacit jñānam utpadyate,

GSP33bhgsbh_u:3469_1: vilakṣaṇa-pratyayānantarito 'bhyāsaḥ sa cābhyāso yogas tena yuktaṃ tatraiva vyāpṛtaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3470: cetasā nānya-gāminā nānyatra viṣayāntare gantuṃ śīlam asyeti nānya-gāmi tena nānya-gāminā,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3471: paramaṃ niratiśayaṃ puruṣaṃ divyaṃ divi sūrya-maṇḍāle bhavaṃ yāti gacchati he pārthānucintayan śāstrācāryopadeśam anudhyāyan ity etat //BhGS_8.8// ==============================
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3473: kiṃ-viśiṣṭaṃ ca puraṣaṃ yāti ? ity ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3478: kaviṃ krānta-darśinaṃ sarva-jñaṃ purāṇaṃ cirantanam anuśāsitāraṃ sarvasya jagataḥ praśāsitāram aṇoḥ sūkṣmād apy aṇīyāṃsaṃ sūkṣmataram anusmared anucintayed yaḥ kaścit,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3479: sarvasya karma-phala-jātasya dhātāraṃ vidhātāraṃ vicitratayā prāṇibhyo vibhaktāram,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3480: acintya-rūpaṃ nāsya rūpaṃ niyataṃ vidyamānam api kenacit cintayituṃ śakyata ity acintya-rūpas tam,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3481: āditya-varṇam ādityasyeva nitya-caitanya-prakāśo varṇo yasya tam āditya-varṇam,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3483: ajñāna-lakṣaṇān mohāndhakārāt paraṃ tam anucintayad yātīti pūrveṇa saṃbandhaḥ //BhGS_8.9// ==============================
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3489: sa taṃ paraṃ puruṣam upaiti divyam //BhG_8.10//
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3490_0: prayāṇa-kāle maraṇa-kāle manasācalena calana-varjitena bhaktyā yukto bhajanaṃ bhaktis
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3490_1: tayā yukto yoga-balena caiva yogasya balaṃ yoga-balaṃ samādhija-saṃskāra-pracaya-janita-citta-sthairya-lakṣaṇaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3490_2: yoga-balaṃ tena ca yukta ity arthaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3491: pūrvaṃ hṛdaya-puṇḍārīke vaśīkṛtya cittaṃ tata ūrdhva-gāminyā nāḍyā bhūmi-jaya-krameṇa bhruvor madhye prāṇam āveśya sthāpayitvā samyag-āpramattaḥ san,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3492: sa evaṃ buddhimān yogī kaviṃ purāṇam ity ādi-lakṣaṇaṃ taṃ paraṃ parataraṃ puruṣam upaiti pratipadyate divyaṃ dyotanātmakam //BhGS_8.10// ==============================
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3494_0: [yoga-mārgānugamanenaiva brahma-vidyām antareṇāpi brahma prāpyata ity evaṃ prāptam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3494_1: idam ucyate ] punar api vakṣyamāṇenopāyena pratipitsitasya brahmaṇo veda-vidvad-anādi-viśeṣaṇa-viśeṣyasyābhidhānaṃ karoti bhagavān -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3499: yad akṣaraṃ na kṣaratīty akṣaram avināśi vedavido vedārthajñāḥ vadanti /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3500: tad vā etad akṣaraṃ gārgi brāhmaṇā abhivadanti [BAU 3.8.8] iti śruteḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3502: kiṃ ca - viśanti praviśanti samyag-darśana-prāptau satyāṃ yad yatayo yatana-śīlāḥ saṃnyāsino vīta-rāgāḥ vīto vigataḥ rāgo yebhyas te vīta-rāgāḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3503: yac cākṣaram icchanto jñātum iti vākya-śeṣaḥ brahmacaryaṃ gurau caranti ācaranti,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3504: tat te padaṃ tad akṣarākhyaṃ padaṃ padanīyaṃ te tava saṃgraheṇa,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3508: sa yo ha vai tad bhagavan manuṣyeṣu prāyaṇāntam oṃkāram abhidhyāyīta /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3509: katamaṃ vāva sa tena lokaṃ jayatīti /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3510: tasmai sa hovāca - etad vai satya-kāma paraṃ cāparaṃ ca brahma yad oṃkāraḥ [PraśnaU 5.1-2] ity upakramya,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3511: yaḥ punar etaṃ trimātreṇa om ity etenaivākṣareṇa paraṃ puruṣam abhidhyāyīta sa sāmabhir unnīyate brahma-lokam [PraśnaU 5.5] ity ādinā vacanena,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3516: tat te padaṃ saṃgraheṇa bravīmy om ity etad [KaṭhU 1.2.15]
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3517: ity ādibhiś ca vacanaiḥ parasya brahmaṇo vācaka-rūpeṇa,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3519: para-brahma-pratipatti-sādhanatvena manda-madhyama-buddhīnāṃ vivakṣitasya oṃkārasyopāsanaṃ kālāntare mukti-phalam uktaṃ yat,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3520_0: tad evehāpi kaviṃ purāṇam anuśāsitāram [Gītā 8.9] yad akṣaraṃ veda-vido vadanti [Gītā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3520_1: 8.11] iti copanyastasya parasya brahmaṇaḥ pūrvokta-rūpeṇa pratipatty-upāya-bhūtasya
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3521: prasaktānuprasaktaṃ ca yat kiṃcid ity evam artha uttare grantha ārabhyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3522: sarva-dvārāṇi saṃyamya mano hṛdi nirudhya ca /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3524: sarva-dvārāṇi sarvāṇi ca tāni dvārāṇi ca sarva-dvārāṇy upalabdhau,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3525: tāni sarvāṇi saṃyasya saṃyamanaṃ kṛtvā mano hṛdi hṛdaya-puṇḍārīke nirūdhya nirodhaṃ kṛtvā niṣpracāram āpādya,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3526: tatra vaśīkṛtena manasā hṛdayād ūrdhva-gāminyā nāḍyordhvam ārūhya mūrdhny ādhāya ātmanaḥ prāṇam āsthitaḥ pṛvṛtto yoga-dhāraṇāṃ dhārayitum //BhGS_8.12// ==============================
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3529: om ity ekākṣaraṃ brahma vyāharan mām anusmaran /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3530: yaḥ prayāti tyajan dehaṃ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim //BhG_8.13//
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3531: om iti ekākṣaraṃ brahma brahmaṇo 'bhidhāna-bhūtam oṃkāraṃ vyāharan ucārayan,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3532: tad-artha-bhūtaṃ mām īśvaram anusmaran anucintayan yaḥ prayāti mriyate,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3533: sa tyajan parityajan dehaṃ śarīram - tyajan deham iti prayāṇa-viśeṣaṇārtham deha-tyāgena prayāṇam ātmanaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3534: na svarūpa-nāśenety arthaḥ - sa evaṃ yāti gacchati paramāṃ prakṛṣṭāṃ gatim //BhGS_8.13// ==============================
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3537: ananya-cetāḥ satataṃ yo māṃ smarati nityaśaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3539: ananya-cetā nānya-viṣaye ceto yasya so 'yam ananya-cetāḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3540: yogī satataṃ sarvadā yo māṃ parameśvaraṃ smarati /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3544: kiṃ tarhi ? yāvaj-jīvaṃ nairantaryeṇa yo māṃ smaratīty arthaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3545: tasya yogino 'haṃ sulabhaḥ sukhena labhyo he pārtha,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3547: yata evam, ato 'nanya-cetāḥ san mayi sadā samāhito bhavet //BhGS_8.14// ==============================
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3549: tava saulabhyena kiṃ syāt ? ity ucyate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3550: sṛṇu tan mama saulabhyena yad bhavati -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3553: mām upetya mām īśvaram upetya mad-bhāvam āpadya punar janma punar utpattiṃ nāpnuvanti na prāpnuvanti /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3555: iti, tad-viśeṣaṇam āha - duḥkhālayaṃ duḥkhānām ādhyātmikādīnām ālayaṃ āśrayam /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3559: nāpnuvanti īdṛśaṃ punar-janma mahātmāno yatayaḥ saṃsiddhiṃ mokṣākhyāṃ paramāṃ prakṛṣṭāṃ gatāḥ prāptāḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3560: ye punar māṃ na prāpnuvanti te punar āvartante //BhGS_8.15// ==============================
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3562: kiṃ punas tvatto 'nyat prāptāḥ punar āvartante ? ity ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3564: mām upetya tu kaunteya punar-janma na vidyate //BhG_8.16//
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3565: ā brahma-bhuvanāt bhavanty asmin bhūtānīti bhuvanam /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3568: ā brahma-bhuvanāt saha brahma-bhuvanena lokāḥ sarve punar-āvartinaḥ punar-āvartana-svabhāvāḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3570: mām ekam upetya tu kaunteya punar-janma punar-utpattiḥ na vidyate //BhGS_8.16// ==============================
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3576: sahasra-yuga-paryantaṃ sahasrāṇi yugāni paryantaḥ paryavasānaṃ yasyāhnas tat ahaḥ sahasra-yuga-paryantam /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3579: ke vidur ity āha - te 'ho-rātra-vidaḥ kāla-saṃkhyā-vido janā ity arthaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3583: prajāpater ahani yad bhavati rātrau ca, tad ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3587: tasmād avyaktād vyaktayo vyajyanta iti vyaktayaḥ sthāvara-jaṅgama-lakṣaṇāḥ sarvāḥ prajāḥ prabhavanty abhivyajyante,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3588: ahna āgamo 'har-āgamas tasmin ahar-āgame kāle brahmaṇaḥ prabodha-kāle /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3589: tathā rātry-āgame brahmaṇaḥ svāpa-kāle pralīyante sarvā vyaktayas tatraiva pūrvokte 'vyakta-saṃjñake //BhGS_8.18// ==============================
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3591_1: avidyādi-kleśa-mūla-karmāśaya-vaśāc cāvaśo bhūta-grāmo bhūtvā bhūtvā pralīyata ity
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3592: bhūta-grāmaḥ sa evāyaṃ bhūtvā bhūtvā pralīyate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3594: bhūta-grāmo bhūta-samudāyaḥ sthāvara-jaṅgama-lakṣaṇo yaḥ pūrvasmin kalpa āsīt sa evāyaṃ nānyaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3596: pralīyate punaḥ punaḥ rātry-āgame 'hnaḥ kṣaye 'vaśo 'svatantra eva /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3601: tasya prāpty-upāyo nirdiṣṭa om ity ekākṣaraṃ brahma [Gītā 8.13] ity ādinā /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3605: yaḥ sa sarveṣu bhūteṣu naśyatsu na vinaśyati //BhG_8.20//
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3610: vyatiriktatve saty api sālakṣaṇya-prasaṅgo 'stīti tad-vinivṛtty-artham āha - anya iti /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3617: sanātanaś cirantano yaḥ sa bhāvaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu brahmādiṣu naśyatsu na vinaśyati //BhGS_8.20// ==============================
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3619: avyakto 'kṣara ity uktas tam āhuḥ paramāṃ gatim /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3620: yaṃ prāpya na nivartante tad dhāma paramaṃ mama //BhG_8.21//
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3621: yo 'sāv avyakto 'kṣara ity uktas tam evākṣara-saṃjñakam avyaktaṃ bhāvam āhuḥ paramāṃ prakṛṣṭāṃ gatim /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3622: yaṃ paraṃ bhāvaṃ prāpya gatvā na nivartante saṃsārāya,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3623: tad dhāma sthānaṃ paramaṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ mama,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3627: puruṣaḥ sa paraḥ pārtha bhaktyā labhyas tv ananyayā /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3628: yasyāntaḥ-sthāni bhūtāni yena sarvam idaṃ tatam //BhG_8.22//
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3633: sa bhaktyā labhyas tu jñāna-lakṣaṇayānanyayā ātma-viṣayayā /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3636: yena puruṣeṇa sarvaṃ idaṃ jagat tataṃ vyāptam ākāśeneva ghaṭādi //BhGS_8.22// ==============================
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3638: prakṛtānāṃ yogināṃ praṇavāveśita-brahma-buddhīnāṃ kālāntara-mukti-bhājāṃ brahma-pratipattaya uttaro mārgo vaktavya iti yatra kāle ity ādi vivakṣitārtha-samarpaṇārtham ucyate,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3640: yatra kāle tv anāvṛttim āvṛttiṃ caiva yoginaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3641: prayātā yānti taṃ kālaṃ vakṣyāmi bharatarṣabha //BhG_8.23//
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3642: yatra kāle prayātā iti vyavahitena saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3643: yatra yasmin kāle tv anāvṛttim apunar-janma āvṛttiṃ tad-viparītāṃ caiva /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3645: karmiṇas tu guṇataḥ karma-yogena yoginām iti viśeṣaṇād yoginaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3646: yatra kāle prayātā mṛtā yogino 'nāvṛttiṃ yānti,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3647: yatra kāle ca prayātāḥ āvṛttiṃ yānti,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3651: agnir jyotir ahaḥ śuklaḥ ṣaṇ-māsā uttarāyaṇam /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3652: tatra prayātā gacchanti brahma brahma-vido janāḥ //BhG_8.24//
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3655: athavā, agni-jyotiṣī yathā śrute eva devate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3656: bhūyasā tu nirdeśo yatra kāle taṃ kālam iti āmra-vanavat /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3660: tatrāpi devataiva mārga-bhūtā [BAU 4.3.4] iti sthito 'nyatrāyaṃ nyāyaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3661: tatra tasmin mārge prayātā mṛtā gacchanti brahma brahma-vido brahmopāsakā brahmopāsana-parā janāḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3663: na hi sadyo-mukti-bhājāṃ samyag darśana-niṣṭhānāṃ gatir āgatir vā kvacid asti /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3664: na tasya prāṇā utkrāmanti [BAU 4.4.6] iti śruteḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3667: dhūmo rātris tathā kṛṣṇaḥ ṣaṇ-māsā dakṣiṇāyanam /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3668: tatra cāndramasaṃ jyotir yogī prāpya nivartate //BhG_8.25//
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3669: dhūmo rātrir dhūmābhimāninī rātry-abhimāninī ca devatā /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3671: ṣaṇ-māsā dakṣiṇāyanam iti ca pūrvavat devataiva /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3672: tatra candramasi bhavaṃ cāndramasaṃ jyotiḥ phalam iṣṭādi-kārī yogī karmī prāpya bhuktvā tat-kṣayād iha punar nivartate //BhGS_8.25// ==============================
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3674: śukla-kṛṣṇe gatī hy ete jagataḥ śāśvate mate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3676: śukla-kṛṣṇe śuklā ca kṛṣṇā ca śukla-kṛṣṇe,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3679: ete śukla-kṛṣṇe hi gatī jagataḥ ity adhikṛtānāṃ jñāna-karmaṇoḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3680: na jagataḥ sarvasyaiva ete gatī saṃbhavataḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3687: naite sṛtī pārtha jānan yogī muhyati kaścana /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3689: na ete yathokte sṛtī mārgau pārtha jānan saṃsārāya ekā,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3691: yogī na muhyati kaścana kaścid api /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3692: tasmāt sarveṣu kāleṣu yoga-yuktaḥ samāhito bhavārjuna //BhGS_8.27// ==============================
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3699: vedeṣu samyag-adhīteṣu yajñeṣu ca sādguṇyenānutiṣṭhiteṣu tapaḥsu ca sutapteṣu dāneṣu ca samyag-datteṣu yad eteṣu puṇya-phalaṃ puṇyasya phalaṃ puṇya-phalaṃ pradiṣṭaṃ śāstreṇa,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3700: atyety atītya gacchati sat sarvaṃ phala-jātam /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3701: idaṃ viditvā sapta-praśna-nirṇaya-dvāreṇoktam arthaṃ samyag avadhāryānuṣṭhāya yogī paraṃ prakṛṣṭam aiśvaraṃ sthānam upaiti ca pratipadyate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3702: ādyam ādau bhavaṃ kāraṇaṃ brahmety arthaḥ //BhGS_8.28//
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3713: tasya ca phalam agny-arcir-ādi-krameṇa kālāntare brahma-prāpti-lakṣaṇam evānāvṛtti-rūpaṃ nirdiṣṭam /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3715: nānyathā iti tad āśaṅkā-vyāvivartayiṣayā śrī-bhagavān uvāca -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3716: idaṃ tu te guhyatamaṃ pravakṣyāmy anasūyave /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3718: idaṃ brahma-jñānaṃ vakṣyamāṇam uktaṃ ca pūrveṣu adhyāyeṣu,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3719: tat buddhau saṃnidhīkṛtya idam ity āha /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3721: idam eva tu samyag-jñānaṃ sākṣāt mokṣa-prāpti-sādhanam vāsudevaḥ sarvam iti [Gītā 7.12],
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3722: ātmaivedaṃ sarvam [ChāU 7.25.2] ekam evādvitīyam [ChāU 6.2.1] ity ādi-śruti-smṛtibhyaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3723: nānyat, atha te ye 'nyathāto vidur anya-rājānas te kṣayya-lokā bhavanti [ChāU 7.25.2] ity ādi-śrutibhyaś ca /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3724: te tubhyaṃ guhyatamaṃ gopyatamaṃ pravakṣyāmi kathayiṣyāmy anasūyave 'sūyā-rahitāya /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3737: pavitraṃ pāvanaṃ idam uttamaṃ sarveṣāṃ pāvanānāṃ śuddhi-kāraṇaṃ brahma-jñānam utkṛṣṭatamam /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3738: aneka-janma-sahasra-saṃcitam api dharmādharmādi sa-mūlaṃ karma kṣaṇa-mātrād eva bhasmīkarotīty ataḥ kiṃ tasya pāvanatvaṃ vaktavyam ?
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3739: kiṃ ca - pratyakṣāvagamaṃ pratyakṣeṇa sukhāder ivāvagamo yasya tat pratyakṣāvagamam /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3743: evam api, syād duḥkha-saṃpādyam ity ata āha - susukhaṃ kartum,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3747: idaṃ tu sukha-saṃpādyatvāt phala-kṣayāt vyetīti prāpte,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3755: aśraddadhānāḥ śraddhā-virahitā ātma-jñānasya dharmasyāsya svarūpe tat-phale ca nāstikāḥ pāpa-kāriṇaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3760: mat-prāptau naivāśaṅketi mat-prāpti-mārga-bheda-bhakti-mātram apy aprāpya ity arthaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3767: mayā tatam idaṃ sarvaṃ jagad avyakta-mūrtinā /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3768: mat-sthāni sarva-bhūtāni na cāhaṃ teṣv avasthitaḥ //BhG_9.4//
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3769: mayā mama yaḥ paro bhāvas tena tataṃ vyāptaṃ sarvam idaṃ jagad avyakta-mūrtinā /

GSP33bhgsbh_u:5114: evam ity atītānantara-lokena uktam arthaṃ parāmṛśati mat-karma-kṛd ity ādinā /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5116: nairantaryeṇa bhagavat-karmādau yathokte 'rthe samāhitāḥ santaḥ pravṛttā ity arthaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5117: ye bhaktā ananya-śaraṇāḥ santas tvāṃ yathā-darśitaṃ viśva-rūpaṃ paryupāsate dhyāyanti /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5118: ye cānye 'pi tyakta-sarveṣaṇāḥ saṃnyasta-sarva-karmāṇo yathā-viśeṣitaṃ brahmākṣaraṃ nirasta-sarvopādhitvād avyaktam akaraṇa-gocaram /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5119: yad dhi karaṇa-gocaraṃ tad vyaktam ucyate,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5127: śrī-bhagavān uvāca - ye tv akṣaropāsakāḥ samyag-darśino nivṛttaiṣaṇās te tāvat tiṣṭhantu /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5129: tad upariṣṭād vakṣyāmaḥ / ye tv itare -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5130: mayy āveśya mano ye māṃ nitya-yuktā upāsate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5131: śraddhayā parayopetās te me yuktatamā matāḥ //BhG_12.2//
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5132: mayi viśva-rūpe parameśvara āveśya samādhāya mano ye bhaktāḥ santaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5133: māṃ sarva-yoge varāṇām adhīśvaraṃ sarvajñaṃ vimukta-rāgādi-kleśa-timira-dṛṣṭim,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5134: nitya-yuktā atītānantarādhyāyāntokta-ślokārtha-nyāyena satata-yuktāḥ santa upāsate śraddhayā parayā prakṛṣṭayopetāḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5135: te me mama matā abhipretā yuktatamā iti /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5137: ato yuktaṃ tān prati yuktatamā iti vaktum //BhGS_12.2// ==============================
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5139: kim itare yuktatamā na bhavanti ? na /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5140: kiṃtu tān prati yad vaktavyam, tac chṛṇu -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5141: ye tv akṣaram anirdeśyam avyaktaṃ paryupāsate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5142: sarvatra-gam acintyaṃ ca kūṭastham acalaṃ dhruvam //BhG_12.3//
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5146: avyaktaṃ na kenāpi pramāṇena vyajyata ity avyaktaṃ paryupāsate pari samantād upāsate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5147: upāsanaṃ nāma yathā-śāstram upāsyasyārthasya viṣayī-karaṇena sāmīpyam upagamya taila-dhārāvat samāna-pratyaya-pravāheṇa dīrgha-kālaṃ yad āsanam,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5149: akṣarasya viśeṣaṇam āha - sarvatra-gaṃ vyomavad vyāpy acintyaṃ cāvyaktatvād acintyam /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5154: kūṭa-rūpam kūṭa-sākṣyam ity ādau kūṭa-śabdaḥ prasiddho loke /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5155: tathā cāvidyādy-aneka-saṃsāra-bījam antar-doṣavan māyā-vyākṛtādi-śabda-vācyatayā māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyān māyinaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5157: mama māyā duratyayā [Gītā 7.14] ity ādau prasiddhaṃ yat tat kūṭam,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5159: athavā, rāśir iva sthitaṃ kūṭa-stham ata evācalam /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5165: te prāpnuvanti mām eva sarva-bhūta-hite ratāḥ //BhG_12.4//
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5166: saṃniyamya samyak niyamya upasaṃhṛtya indriya-grāmam indriya-samudāyaṃ sarvatra sarvasmin kāle sama-buddhayaḥ samā tulyā buddhir yeṣām iṣṭāniṣṭa-prāptau te sama-buddhayaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5167: te ye evaṃ-vidhās te prāpnuvanti mām eva sarva-bhūta-hite ratāḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5168: na tu teṣāṃ vaktavyaṃ kiṃcit māṃ te prāpnuvantīti /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5169: jñānī tv ātmaiva me matam iti hy uktam /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5170: na hi bhagavat-svarūpāṇāṃ satāṃ yuktatamatvam ayuktatamatvaṃ vā vācyam //BhGS_12.4// ==============================
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5174: avyaktā hi gatir duḥkhaṃ dehavadbhir avāpyate //BhG_12.5//
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5178: avyaktāsakta-cetasām avyakta āsaktaṃ ceto yeṣāṃ te 'vyaktāsakta-cetasas teṣām avyaktāsakta-cetasām /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5179: avyaktā hi yasmād yā gatir akṣarātmikā duḥkhaṃ sā dehavadbhir dehābhimānavadbhir avāpyate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5184: ye tu sarvāṇi karmāṇi mayi saṃnyasya mat-parāḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5186_0: ye tu sarvāṇi karmāṇi mayīśvare saṃnyasya mat-parā ahaṃ paro yeṣāṃ te mat-parāḥ santo
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5186_1: 'nanyenaivāvidyamānam anyat ālambanaṃ viśva-rūpaṃ devam ātmānaṃ muktvā yasya so 'nanyas tenānanyenaiva /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5187: kena ? yogena samādhinā māṃ dhyāyantaś cintayanta upāsate //BhGS_12.6// ==============================
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5193: kutaḥ ? ity āha - mṛtyu-saṃsāra-sāgarān mṛtyu-yuktaḥ saṃsāro mṛtyu-saṃsāraḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5196: tasmāt mṛtyu-saṃsāra-sāgarāt ahaṃ teṣāṃ samuddhartā bhavāmi na cirāt /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5197: kiṃ tarhi ? kṣipram eva he pārtha,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5198: mayi āveśita-cetasāṃ mayi viśva-rūpa āveśitaṃ samāhitaṃ ceto yeṣāṃ te mayy āveśita-cetasas teṣām //BhGS_12.7// ==============================
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5201: mayy eva mana ādhatsva mayi buddhiṃ niveśaya /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5202: nivasiṣyasi mayy eva ata ūrdhvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ //BhG_12.8//
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5203: mayy eva viśva-rūpa īśvare manaḥ saṃkalpa-vikalpātmakaṃ ādhatsva sthāpaya /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5204: mayy evādhyavasāyaṃ kurvatīṃ buddhim ādhatsva niveśaya /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5205: tatas te kiṃ syād iti sṛṇu - nivasiṣyasi nivatsyasi niścayena mad-ātmanā mayi nivāsaṃ kariṣyasi /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5210: atha cittaṃ samādhātuṃ na śaknoṣi mayi sthiram /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5212: atha evaṃ yathāvocaṃ tathā mayi cittaṃ samādhātuṃ sthāpayituṃ sthiram acalaṃ na śaknoṣi cet,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5214: cittasyaikasmin ālambane sarvataḥ samāhṛtya punaḥ punaḥ sthāpanam abhyāsaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5215: tat-pūrvako yogaḥ samādhāna-lakṣaṇas tenābhyāsa-yogena māṃ viśva-rūpam iccha prārthayasva āptuṃ prāptum /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5219: mad-artham api karmāṇi kurvan siddhim avāpsyasi //BhG_12.10//
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5221: tarhi mat-karma-paramo bhava mad-arthaṃ karma mat-karma tat-paramaḥ mat-karma-paramaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5223: abhyāsena vinā mad-artham api karmāṇi kevalaṃ kurvan siddhiṃ sattva-śuddhi-yoga-jñāna-prāpti-dvāreṇāvāpsyasi //BhGS_12.10// ==============================
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5225: athaitad apy aśakto 'si kartuṃ mad-yogam āśritaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5227: atha punar etad api yad uktaṃ mat-karma-paramatvam,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5230: āśrito mayi kriyamāṇāni karmāṇi saṃnyasya yat karaṇaṃ teṣām anuṣṭhānaṃ sa mad-yogaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5232: sarva-karma-phala-tyāgaṃ sarveṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ phala-saṃnyāsaṃ sarva-karma-phala-tyāgaṃ tato 'nantaraṃ kuru yatātmavān saṃyata-cittaḥ san ity arthaḥ //BhGS_12.11// ==============================
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5235: śreyo hi jñānam abhyāsāj jñānād dhyānaṃ viśiṣyate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5239: tasmād api jñānāj jñāna-pūrvakaṃ dhyānaṃ viśiṣyate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5240: jñānavato dhyānād api karma-phala-tyāgo viśiṣyata ity anuṣajyate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5241: evaṃ karma-phala-tyāgāt pūrva-viśeṣaṇavataḥ śāntir upaśamaḥ sa-hetukasya saṃsārasyānantaram eva syāt,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5243: ajñasya karmaṇi pravṛttasya pūrvopadiṣṭopāyānuṣṭhānāśaktau sarva-karmaṇāṃ phala-tyāgaḥ śreyaḥ-sādhanam upadiṣṭam,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5245: ataś ca śreyo hi jñānam abhyāsād ity uttarottara-viśiṣṭatvopadeśena sarva-karma-phala-tyāgaḥ stūyate,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5248: yadā sarve pramucyanta iti sarva-kāma-prahāṇād amṛtatvam uktam /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5251: tat-tyāge ca viduṣo dhyāna-niṣṭhasyānantaraiva śāntir iti sarva-kāma-tyāga-sāmānyam ajña-karma-phala-tyāgasyāstīti tat-sāmānyāt sarva-karma-phala-tyāga-stutir iyaṃ prarocanārthā /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5252: yathāgastyena brāhmaṇena samudraḥ pīta itīdānīṃtanā api brāhmaṇā brāhmaṇatva-sāmānyāt stūyante,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5256: atra cātmeśvara-bhedam āśritya viśva-rūpa īśvare cetaḥ-samādhāna-lakṣaṇo yoga uktaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5258: athaitad apy aśakto 'si [Gītā 12.11] ity ajñāna-kārya-sūcanān nābheda-darśino 'kṣaropāsakasya karma-yoga upapadyata iti darśayati /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5260: te prāpnuvanti mām eva [Gītā 12.4] ity akṣaropāsakānāṃ kaivalya-prāptau svātantryam uktvā,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5261: itareṣāṃ pāratantryād īśvarādhīnatāṃ darśitavān teṣām ahaṃ samuddhartā [Gītā 12.7] iti /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5263: akṣara-svarūpā eva ta iti samuddharaṇa-karma-vacanaṃ tān praty apeśalaṃ syāt /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5264: yasmāc cārjunasyātyantam eva hitaiṣī bhagavān tasya samyag-darśanānanvitaṃ karma-yogaṃ bheda-dṛṣṭimantam eva upadiśati /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5266: buddhvā kasyacid guṇa-bhāvaṃ jigamiṣati kaścid, virodhāt /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5267: tasmād akṣaropāsakānāṃ samyag darśana-niṣṭhānāṃ saṃnyāsināṃ tyakta-sarveṣaṇānām adveṣṭā sarva-bhūtānām ity ādi-dharma-pūgaṃ sākṣād amṛtatva-kāraṇaṃ vakṣyāmīti pravartate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5268: adveṣṭā sarva-bhūtānāṃ maitraḥ karuṇa eva ca /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5271: ātmano duḥkha-hetum api na kiṃcid dveṣṭi,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5273: maitro mitra-bhāvo maitrī mitratayā vartata iti maitraḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5281: sama-duḥkha-sukhaḥ same duḥkha-sukhe dveṣa-rāgayor apravartake yasya sa sama-duḥkha-sukhaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5286: mayy arpita-mano-buddhir yo mad-bhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ //BhG_12.14//
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5287: saṃtuṣṭaḥ satataṃ nityaṃ deha-sthiti-kāraṇasya lābhe 'lābhe ca utpannālaṃ-pratyayaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5291: dṛḍha-niścayo dṛḍhaḥ sthiro niścayo 'dhyavasāyo yasyātma-tattva-viṣaye sa dṛḍha-niścayaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5294: te mayy evārpite sthāpite yasya saṃnyāsinaḥ sa mayy arpita-mano-buddhiḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5295: ya īdṛśo mad-bhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5296: priyo hi jñānino 'ty artham ahaṃ sa ca mama priya iti saptame 'dhyāye sūcitam,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5299: yasmān nodvijate loko lokān nodvijate ca yaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5300: harṣāmarṣa-bhayodvegair mukto yaḥ sa ca me priyaḥ //BhG_12.15//
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5301: yasmāt saṃnyāsino nodvijate nodvegaṃ gacchati na santapyate na saṃkṣubhyati lokaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5303: harṣāmarṣa-bhayodvegair harṣaś cāmarṣaś ca bhayaṃ codvegaś ca tair harṣāmarṣa-bhayodvegair muktaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5308: tair mukto yaḥ sa ca me priyaḥ //BhGS_12.15// ==============================
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5311: sarvārambha-parityāgī yo mad-bhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ //BhG_12.16//
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5313: śucir bāhyena ābhyantareṇa ca śaucena saṃpannaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5314: dakṣaḥ pratyutpanneṣu kāryeṣu sadyo yathāvat pratipattuṃ samarthaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5315: udāsīno na kasyacit mitrādeḥ pakṣaṃ bhajate yaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5320: tān parityaktuṃ śīlam asyeti sarvārambha-parityāgī yaḥ mad-bhaktaḥ saḥ me priyaḥ //BhGS_12.16// ==============================
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5323: yo na hṛṣyati na dveṣṭi na śocati na kāṅkṣati /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5324: śubhāśubha-parityāgī bhaktimān yaḥ sa me priyaḥ //BhG_12.17//
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5329: śubhāśubhe karmaṇī parityaktuṃ śīlam asyeti śubhāśubha-parityāgī bhaktimān yaḥ sa me priyaḥ //BhGS_12.17// ==============================
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5331: samaḥ śatrau ca mitre ca tathā mānāpamānayoḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5340: aniketaḥ sthira-matir bhaktimān me priyo naraḥ //BhG_12.19//
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5347: yena kenacid ācchanno yena kenacid āśitaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5348: yatra kvacana śāyī syāt taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ // [Mbh 12.245.12] iti /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5349: kiṃ ca, aniketo niketa āśrayo nivāso niyato na vidyate yasya so 'niketaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5351: sthira-matiḥ sthirā paramārtha-viṣayā yasya matiḥ saḥ sthira-matiḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5354: adveṣṭā sarva-bhūtānām [Gītā 12.13] ity ādinākṣaropāsakānāṃ nivṛtta-sarveṣaṇānāṃ saṃnyāsināṃ paramārtha-jñāna-niṣṭhānāṃ dharma-jātaṃ prakrāntam upasaṃhriyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5355: ye tu dharmyāmṛtam idaṃ yathoktaṃ paryupāsate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5356: śraddadhānā mat-paramā bhaktās te 'tīva me priyāḥ //BhG_12.20//
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5357: ye tu saṃnyāsino dharmyāmṛtaṃ dharmād anapetaṃ dharmyaṃ ca tad amṛtaṃ ca tat,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5360: adveṣṭā sarva-bhūtānām ity ādinā paryupāsate 'nutiṣṭhanti śraddadhānāḥ santaḥ mat-paramāḥ yathokto 'ham akṣarātmā paramo niratiśayā gatir yeṣāṃ te mat-paramāḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5363: priyo hi jñānino 'ty artham [Gītā 7.18] iti yat sūcitaṃ tat vyākhyāyehopasaṃhṛtam bhaktās te 'tīva me priyā iti /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5364: yasmād dharmyāmṛtam idaṃ yathoktam anutiṣṭhan bhagavato viṣṇoḥ parameśvarasyātīva priyo bhavati,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5365: tasmād idaṃ dharmyāmṛtaṃ mumukṣuṇā yatnato 'nuṣṭheyaṃ viṣṇoḥ priyaṃ paraṃ dhāma jigamiṣuṇeti vākyārthaḥ //BhGS_12.20//
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5371: [*NOTE: Numbering of this adhyaya out of tune with standard editions
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5376: saptame 'dhyāye sūcite dve prakṛtī īśvarasya triguṇātmikāṣṭadhā bhinnāparā saṃsāra-hetutvāt,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5379: tatra kṣetra-kṣetrajña-lakṣaṇa-prakṛti-dvaya-nirūpaṇa-dvāreṇa tadvata īśvarasya tattva-nirdhāraṇārthaṃ kṣetrādhyāya ārabhyate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5380: atītānantarādhyāye ca adveṣṭā sarva-bhūtānāṃ [Gītā 12.13] ity ādinā yāvad-adhyāya-parisamāptis tāvat tattva-jñānināṃ sannyāsināṃ niṣṭhā yathā te vartanta ity etad uktam /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5381: kena punas te tattva-jñānena yuktā yathokta-dharmācaraṇād bhagavataḥ priyā bhavanty evam arthaś cāyam adhyāya ārabhyate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5382: prakṛtiś ca triguṇātmikā sarva-kārya-karaṇa-viṣayākāreṇa pariṇatā puruṣasya bhogāpavargārtha-kartavyatayā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5386: idaṃ śarīraṃ kaunteya kṣetram ity abhidhīyate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5387: etad yo vetti taṃ prāhuḥ kṣetrajña iti tad-vidaḥ //BhG_13.1//
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5388: idam iti sarva-nāmnoktaṃ viśinaṣṭi śariram iti /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5394: etac charīraṃ kṣetraṃ yo vetti vijānāti,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5397: taṃ veditāraṃ prāhuḥ kathayanti kṣetrajña iti /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5400: ke ? tad-vidas tau kṣetra-kṣetrajñau ye vidanti te tad-vidaḥ //BhGS_13.1// ==============================
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5405: kṣetrajñaṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi sarva-kṣetreṣu bhārata /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5406: kṣetra-kṣetrajñayor jñānaṃ yat taj jñānaṃ mataṃ mama //BhG_13.2//
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5407: kṣetrajñaṃ yathokta-lakṣaṇaṃ cāpi māṃ parameśvaram asaṃsāriṇaṃ viddhi jānīhi /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5411: yasmāt kṣetra-kṣetrajñeśvara-yāthātmya-vyatirekeṇa na jñāna-gocaram anyad avaśiṣṭam asti,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5412: tasmāt kṣetra-kṣetrajñayor jñeya-bhūtayor yaj jñānaṃ kṣetra-kṣetrajñau yena jñānena viṣayīkriyete,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5413: taj jñānaṃ samyag-jñānam iti matam abhiprāyaḥ mameśvarasya viṣṇoḥ //
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5426: dūram ete viparīte viṣūcī avidyā yā ca vidyeti jñātā [KaṭhU 1.2.4] tathā tayor vidyāvidyā-viṣayayoḥ phala-bhedo 'pi viruddho nirdiṣṭaḥ - śreyaś ca preyaś ca [KaṭhU 1.2.2] iti /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5431: imau dvāv eva panthānāv ity ādi ca /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5433: avidyā ca saha kāryeṇa vidyayā hātavyeti śruti-smṛti-nyāyebhyo 'vagamyate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5434: śrutayas tāvat - iha ced avedīd atha satyam asti na ced ihāvedīn mahatī vinaṣṭiḥ [KenaU 2.5],
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5435: tam evaṃ vidvān amṛta iha bhavati [TaittĀ 3.12],
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5436: nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāya [ŚvetU 3.8] vidvān na bibheti kutaścana [TaittU 2.9] /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5437: aviduṣas tu - atha tasya bhayaṃ bhavati [TaittU 2.7],
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5440: anyo 'sāv anyo 'ham asmīti na sa veda yathā paśur evaṃ sa devānām [BAU 1.4.10] /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5441: ātmavid yaḥ sa idaṃ sarvaṃ bhavati [BAU 1.4.10],
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5443: smṛtayaś ca - ajñānenāvṛtaṃ jñānaṃ tena muhyanti jantavaḥ [Gītā 5.25],
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5444: ihaiva tair jitaḥ sargo yeṣāṃ sāmye sthitaṃ manaḥ [Gītā 5.19],
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5445: samaṃ paśyan hi sarvatra [Gītā 13.29] ity ādyāḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5451: tathā ca - dehādiṣu ātma-buddhir avidvān rāga-dveṣādi-prayukto dharmādharmānuṣṭhāna-kṛj jāyate mriyate cety avagamyate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5452: dehādi-vyatiriktātma-darśino rāga-dveṣādi-prahāṇāpekṣa-dharmādharma-pravṛtty-upaśamān mucyanta iti na kenacit pratyākhyātuṃ śakyaṃ nyāyataḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5456: sarva-jantūnāṃ hi prasiddho dehādiṣv anātmasu ātma-bhāvo niścito 'vidyā-kṛtaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5461: deha-dharmo vā cetanasya sukha-duḥkha-mohātmakatvādir ātmano na yuktaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5465: iti cet - sthāṇu-puruṣau jñeyāv eva santau jñātrānyonyasminn adhyastāv avidyayā /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5468: ato deha-dharmo jñeyo 'pi jñātur ātmano bhavatīti cet, na /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5470: yadi hi jñeyasya dehādeḥ kṣetrasya dharmāḥ sukha-duḥkha-mohecchādayo jñātur bhavanti,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5472: jñeyasya kṣetrasya dharmāḥ kecit ātmano bhavanty avidyādhyāropitāḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5473: jarā-maraṇādayas tu na bhavantīti viśeṣa-hetur vaktavyaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5474: na bhavantīty asty anumānam - avidyādhyāropitatvāj jarā-maraṇādivad iti,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5478: kartṛtva-bhoktṛtva-lakṣaṇaḥ saṃsāro jñeya-stho jñātary avidyayādhyāropita iti,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5482: sarva-kṣetreṣv api sato bhagavataḥ kṣetrajñasyeśvarasya saṃsāritva-gandha-mātram api nāśaṅkayam /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5483: na hi kvacid api loke 'vidyādhyastena dharmeṇa kasyacid upakāro 'pakāro vā dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5484: yat tūktam - na samo dṛṣṭānta iti, tad asat /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5485: katham ? avidyādhyāsa-mātraṃ hi dṛṣṭānta-dārṣṭāntikayoḥ sādharmyaṃ vivakṣitam /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5489: avidyāvattvāt kṣetrajñasya saṃsāritvam iti cet, na /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5495: viveka-prakāśa-bhāve tad-abhāvāt tāmase cāvaraṇātmake timirādi-doṣe saty agrahaṇāder avidyā-trayasya upalabdheḥ //
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5501: tatra yad uktam īśvara eva kṣetrajñaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5502: na saṃsārīty etad ayuktam iti, tan na /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5504: na viparītādi-grahaṇaṃ tan-nimittaṃ vā taimirikatvādi-doṣo grahītuḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5505: cakṣuṣaḥ saṃskāreṇa timire 'panīte grahītur adarśanān na grahītur dharmo yathā /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5506: tathā sarvatraivāgrahaṇa-viparīta-saṃśaya-pratyayās tan-nimittāḥ karaṇasyaiva kasyacit bhavitum arhanti,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5508: saṃvedyatvāc ca teṣāṃ pradīpa-prakāśavan na jñātṛ-dharmatvam /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5513: tato na kadācid api tena viyogaḥ syāt /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5514: avikriyasya ca vyomavat sarva-gatasyāmūrtasya ātmanaḥ kenacit saṃyoga-viyogānupapatteḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5517: nanv evaṃ sati saṃsāra-saṃsāritvābhāve śāstrānarthakyādi-doṣaḥ syād iti cet, na /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5519: sarvair hy ātma-vādibhir abhyupagato doṣo naikena parihartavyo bhavati /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5521: muktātmanāṃ hi saṃsāra-saṃsāritva-vyavahārābhāvaḥ sarvair eva ātma-vādibhir iṣyate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5525: avidyā-viṣaye cārthavattvam - yathā dvaitināṃ sarveṣāṃ bandhāvasthāyām eva śāstrādy-arthavattvam,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5527: nanv ātmano bandha-muktāvasthe paramārthata eva vastu-bhūte dvaitināṃ sarveṣām /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5536: yugapat tāvat virodhān na saṃbhavataḥ sthiti-gatī ivaikasmin /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5542: kiṃ ca, bandha-muktāvasthayoḥ paurvāparya-nirūpaṇāyāṃ bandhāvasthā pūrvaṃ prakalpyā,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5546: na cāvasthāvato 'vasthāntaraṃ gacchato nityatvam upapādayituṃ śakyam /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5552: aviduṣāṃ hi phala-hetvor anātmanor ātma-darśanam, na viduṣām /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5555: na hy atyanta-mūḍha unmattādir api jalāgnyoś chāyā-prakāśayor vaikātmyaṃ paśyati /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5557: tasmān na vidhi-pratiṣedha-śāstraṃ tāvat phala-hetubhyām ātmano 'nyatva-darśino bhavati /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5559: tvam idaṃ kuru” iti kasmiṃścit karmaṇi niyukte,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5560: “viṣṇumitro 'haṃ niyuktaḥ” iti tatra-stho niyogaṃ sṛṇvann api pratipadyate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5563: nanu prākṛta-saṃbandhāpekṣayā yuktaiva pratipattiḥ śāstrārtha-viṣayā - phala-hetubhyām anyātma-viṣaya-darśane 'pi sati - iṣṭa-phala-hetau pravartito 'smi,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5565: yathā pitṛ-putrādīnām itaretarātmānyatva-darśane saty apy anyonya-niyoga-pratiṣedhārtha-pratipattiḥ / na /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5567: vyatiriktātma-darśana-pratipatteḥ prāg eva phala-hetvor ātmābhimānasya siddhatvāt /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5568: pratipanna-niyoga-pratiṣedhārtho hi phala-hetubhyām ātmano 'nyatvaṃ pratipadyate, na pūrvam /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5570: nanu svarga-kāmo yajeta [Ap.Śr.S. 10.2.1] na kalañjaṃ bhakṣayed ity ādāv ātma-vyatireka-darśinām apravṛttau,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5572: ataḥ kartur abhāvāc chāstrānarthakyam iti cet, na /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5575: tathā nairātmyavādy api nāsti para-loka iti na pravartate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5576: yathā-prasiddhitas tu vidhi-pratiṣedha-śāstra-śravaṇānyathānupapattyānumitātmāstitva ātma-viśeṣānabhijñaḥ karma-phala-saṃjāta-tṛṣṇaḥ śraddadhānatayā ca pravartate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5579: vivekinām apravṛtti-darśanāt tad-anugāminām apravṛttau śāstrānarthakyam iti cet, na /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5581: anekeṣu hi prāṇiṣu kaścid eva vivekī syāt,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5587: svabhāvas tu pravartate [Gītā 5.14] iti hi uktam //
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5590: na ca mithyā-jñānaṃ paramārtha-vastu dūṣayituṃ samartham /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5591: na hy ūṣara-deśaṃ snehena paṅkī-kartuṃ śaknoti marīcy-udakam /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5592: tathāvidyā kṣetrajñasya na kiṃcit kartuṃ śaknoti /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5593: ataś cedam uktam - kṣetrajñaṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5595: atha kim idaṃ saṃsāriṇām ivāham evam mamaivedam iti paṇḍitānām api ? sṛṇu /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5598: yadi punaḥ kṣetrajñam avikriyaṃ paśyeyus tato na bhogaṃ karma vākāṅkṣeyur mama syād iti /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5602: viduṣaḥ punar avikriyātma-darśinaḥ phalārthitvābhāvāt pravṛtty-anupapattau kārya-karaṇa-saṃghāta-vyāpāroparame nivṛttir upacaryate //
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5603: idaṃ cānyat pāṇḍityaṃ kasyacid astu - kṣetrajña īśvara eva /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5605: ahaṃ tu saṃsārī sukhī duḥkhī ca /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5607: dhyānena ceśvaraṃ kṣetrajñaṃ sākṣāt kṛtvā tat-svarūpāvasthāneneti /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5613: ātmahā svayaṃ mūḍho 'nyāṃ ca vyāmohayati śāstrārtha-saṃpradāya-rahitatvāt,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5615: tasmāt asaṃpradāya-vit sarva-śāstra-vid api mūrkhavad eva upekṣaṇīyaḥ //
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5616: yat tūktam īśvarasya kṣetrajñaikatve saṃsāritvaṃ prāpnoti /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5618: etau doṣau pratyuktau vidyāvidyayor vailakṣaṇyābhyupagamād iti /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5619: katham ? avidyā-parikalpita-doṣeṇa tad-viṣayaṃ vastu pāramārthikaṃ na duṣyatīti /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5620: tathā ca dṛṣṭanto darśitaḥ - marīcy-ambhasā ūṣara-deśo na paṅkīkriyata iti /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5623: tat-kṛtaṃ ca sukhitva-duḥkhitvādi pratyakṣam upalabhyate iti cet, na /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5626: yāvat kiṃcit kṣetrajñasya doṣa-jātam avidyamānam āsañjayasi,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5633: yady ātmano dharmo 'vidyāvattvaṃ duḥkhitvādi ca kathaṃ bhoḥ pratyakṣam upalabhyate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5635: jñeyaṃ ca sarvaṃ kṣetraṃ jñātaiva kṣetrajña ity avadhārite,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5636: avidyā-duḥkhitvādeḥ kṣetrajña-viśeṣaṇatvaṃ kṣetrajña-dharmatvaṃ tasya ca pratyakṣopalabhyatvam iti viruddham ucyate 'vidyā-mātrāvaṣṭambhāt
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5641: atrocyate - avidyā kasya dṛśyate iti praśno nirarthakaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5644: na ca tadvaty upalabhyamāne sā kasya ?
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5646: na hi gomati upalabhyamāne gāvaḥ kasya ?
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5649: gavāṃ tadvataś ca pratyakṣatvāt tat-saṃbandho 'pi pratyakṣa iti praśno nirarthakaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5658: jānāsi tarhy avidyāṃ tadvantaṃ ca ātmānam /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5662: na hi tava jñātuḥ jñeya-bhūtayāvidyayā tat-kāle saṃbandho grahītuṃ śakyate,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5664: na ca jñātur avidyāyā ca saṃbandhasya yo grahītā,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5676: avidyā-duḥkhitvādyair na jñātuḥ kṣetrajñasya kiṃcit duṣyati //
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5681: yathātra bhagavatā kriyākāraka-phalātmatvābhāva ātmani svata eva darśitaḥ - avidyādhyāropita eva kriyā-kārakādir ātmany upacaryate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5682: tathā tatra tatra ya enaṃ vetti hantāram [Gītā 2.19],
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5684: nādatte kasyacit pāpam [Gītā 5.15] ity ādi-prakaraṇeṣu darśitaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5692: etad eva ca na hi deha-bhṛtā śakyam ity atra darśayiṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5693: sarva-śāstrārthopasaṃhāra-prakaraṇe ca samāsenaiva kaunteya niṣṭhā jñānasya yā parā ity atra viśeṣato darśayiṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5697: idaṃ śarīram [Gītā 13.2] ity-ādi-ślokopadiṣṭasya kṣetrādhyāyārthasya saṃgraha-śloko 'yam upanyasyate tat kṣetraṃ yac cety ādi,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5698: vyācikhyāsitasya hy arthasya saṃgrahopanyāso nyāyya iti -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5699: tat kṣetraṃ yac ca yādṛk ca yad-vikāri yataś ca yat /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5700: sa ca yo yat-prabhāvaś ca tat samāsena me śṛṇu //BhG_13.3//
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5701: yan nirdiṣṭam idaṃ śarīram iti tat tac-chabdena parāmṛśati /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5702: yac ca idaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ kṣetraṃ tat yādṛk yādṛśaṃ svakīyair dharmaiḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5704: yad-vikāri yo vikāro yasya tat yad-vikāri,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5707: sa ca yaḥ kṣetrajño nirdiṣṭaḥ sa yat-prabhāvo ye prabhāvā upādhi-kṛtāḥ śaktayo yasya sa yat-prabhāvaś ca /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5708: tat kṣetra-kṣetrajñayor yāthātmyaṃ yathā-viśeṣitaṃ samāsena saṃkṣepeṇa me mama vākyataḥ śṛṇu /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5712: ṛṣibhir bahudhā gītaṃ chandobhir vividhaiḥ pṛthak /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5714: ṛṣibhir vasiṣṭhādibhir bahudhā bahu-prakāraṃ gītaṃ kathitam /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5715: chandobhiś chandāṃsi ṛg-ādīni taiś chandobhir vividhair nānā-bhāvair nānā-prakāraiḥ pṛthag vivekato gītam /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5716_0: kiṃ ca, brahma-sūtra-padaiś caiva brahmaṇaḥ sūcakāni vākyāni brahma-sūtrāṇi taiḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5716_1: padyate gamyate jñāyata iti tāni padāny ucyante tair eva ca kṣetra-kṣetrajña-yāthātmyam
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5717: ātmety evopāsīta ity evam ādibhir brahma-sūtra-padair ātmā jñāyate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5718: hetumadbhir yukti-yuktair viniścitair niḥsaṃśaya-rūpair niścita-pratyayotpādakair ity arthaḥ //BhGS_13.4// ==============================
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5721: mahā-bhūtāny ahaṃkāro buddhir avyaktam eva ca /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5723: mahā-bhūtāni mahānti ca tāni sarva-vikāra-vyāpakatvād bhūtāni ca sūkṣmāṇi /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5728: na vyaktam avyaktam avyākṛtam īśvara-śaktir mama māyā duratyayā ity uktam /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5729: eva-śabdaḥ prakṛty-avadhāraṇārtha etāvaty evāṣṭadhā bhinnā prakṛtiḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5741: athedānīṃ ātma-guṇāḥ iti yān ācakṣate vaiśeṣikās te 'pi kṣetra-dharmā eva,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5743: icchā dveṣaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃghātaś cetanā dhṛtiḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5745: icchā yaj-jātīyaṃ sukha-hetum artham upalabdhavān pūrvam,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5746: punas taj-jātīyam upalabhamānas tam ādātum icchati sukha-hetur iti /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5750: punas taj-jātīyam artham upalabhamānas taṃ dveṣṭi /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5752: tathā sukham anukūlaṃ prasanna-sattvātmakaṃ jñeyatvāt kṣetram eva /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5764: etat kṣetraṃ samāsena sa-vikāraṃ saha vikāreṇa mahad-ādinā udāhṛtam uktam //BhGS_13.6// ==============================
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5766: yasya kṣetra-bheda-jātasya saṃhatiḥ idaṃ śarīraṃ kṣetram [Gītā 13.2] ity uktam /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5768: kṣetrajño vakṣyamāṇa-viśeṣaṇaḥ - yasya sa-prabhāvasya kṣetrajñasya parijñānād amṛtatvaṃ bhavati,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5769: tam jñeyaṃ yat tat pravakṣyāmīty ādinā sa-viśeṣaṇaṃ svayam eva vakṣyati bhagavān /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5773: tam amānitvādi-gaṇaṃ jñāna-sādhanatvāj jñāna-śabda-vācyaṃ vidadhāti bhagavān -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5776: amānitvaṃ mānino bhāvaḥ mānitvam ātmano ślāghanam,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5785: antaś ca manasaḥ pratipakṣa-bhāvanayā rāgādi-malānām apanayanaṃ śaucam /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5788: ātma-vinigraha ātmano 'pakārakasya ātma-śabda-vācyasya kārya-karaṇa-saṃghātasya vinigrahaḥ svabhāvena sarvataḥ pravṛttasya san-mārga eva nirodha ātma-vinigrahaḥ //BhGS_13.7// ==============================
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5793: indriyārtheṣu śabdādiṣu dṛṣṭādṛṣṭeṣu bhogeṣu virāga-bhāvo vairāgyam /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5795: janma-mṛtyu-jarā-vyādhi-duḥkha-doṣānudarśanaṃ janma ca mṛtyuś ca jarā ca vyādhayaś ca duḥkhāni ca teṣu janmādi-duḥkhānteṣu pratyekaṃ doṣānudarśanam /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5802: athavā duḥkhāny eva doṣo duḥkha-doṣas tasya janmādiṣu pūrvavad anudarśanam /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5810: evaṃ janmādiṣu duḥkha-doṣānudarśanād dehendriyādi-viṣaya-bhogeṣu vairāgyam upajāyate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5821: yathānyasmin sukhini duḥkhini vāham eva sukhī,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5823: jīvati mṛte vāham eva jīvāmi mariṣyāmi ceti /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5825: putreṣu dāreṣu gṛheṣv ādi-grahaṇād anyeṣv apy atyanteṣṭeṣu dāsa-vargādiṣu /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5828: kva ? iṣṭāniṣṭopapattiṣv iṣṭānām aniṣṭānāṃ copapattayaḥ saṃprāptayas tāsv iṣṭāniṣṭopapattiṣu nityam eva tulya-cittatā /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5836: mayi ceśvare 'nanya-yogena apṛthak-samādhinā nānyo bhagavato vāsudevāt paro 'sti,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5837: ataḥ sa eva no gatir ity evaṃ niścitāvyabhicāriṇī buddhir ananya-yogaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5838: tena bhajanaṃ bhaktir na vyabhicaraṇa-śīlā avyabhicāriṇī /

GSP33bhgsbh_u:6017: kiṃ ca, sarvatra vidyamānam api san nopalabhyate cet,

GSP33bhgsbh_u:6041: etāvān sarvo hi vedārtho gītārthaś copasaṃhṛtyoktaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6043_0: ity ucyate - mad-bhakto mayīśvare sarvajñe parama-gurau vāsudeve samarpita-sarvātma-bhāvo
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6043_1: yat paśyati śṛṇoti spṛśati vā sarvam eva bhagavān vāsudevaḥ ity evaṃ-grahāviṣṭa-buddhir
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6043_2: mad-bhaktaḥ sa etad yathoktaṃ samyag darśanaṃ vijñāya,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6044: mad-bhāvāya mama bhāvo mad-bhāvaḥ paramātma-bhāvas tasmai mad-bhāvāya upapadyate,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6047: tatra saptame īśvarasya dve prakṛtī upanyaste parāpare kṣetra-kṣetrajña-lakṣaṇe /

GSP33bhgsbh_u:6053: tau prakṛti-puruṣau ubhāv apy anādi viddhi,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6054: na vidyate ādir yayos tau anādī /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6055: nityeśvaratvād īśvarasya tat-prakṛtyor api yuktaṃ nityatvena bhavitum /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6057: yābhyāṃ prakṛtibhyām īśvaro jagad-utpatti-sthiti-pralaya-hetus te dve 'nādī satyau saṃsārasya kāraṇam //
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6058: nādī anādī iti tat-puruṣa-samāsaṃ kecit varṇayanti /

GSP33bhgsbh_u:6067: vakṣyamāṇān vikārān buddhy-ādi-dehendriyāntān guṇāṃś ca sukha-duḥkha-moha-pratyayākāra-pariṇatān viddhi jānīhi prakṛti-saṃbhavān /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6069: sā saṃbhavo yeṣāṃ vikārāṇāṃ guṇānāṃ ca tān vikārān
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6072: ke punas te vikārāḥ guṇāś ca prakṛti-saṃbhavāḥ ? ity āha --
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6075: kārya-karaṇa-kartṛtve - kāryaṃ śarīraṃ karaṇāni tat-sthāni trayodaśa /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6076: dehasyārambhakāṇi bhūtāni pañca viṣayāś ca prakṛti-saṃbhavāḥ vikārāḥ pūrvoktā iha kārya-grahaṇena gṛhyante /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6077: guṇāś ca prakṛti-saṃbhavāḥ sukha-duḥkha-mohātmakāḥ karaṇāśrayatvāt karaṇa-grahaṇena gṛhyante /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6078: teṣāṃ kārya-karaṇānāṃ kartṛtvam utpādakatvaṃ yat tat kārya-karaṇa-kartṛtvaṃ tasmin kārya-karaṇa-kartṛtve hetuḥ kāraṇam ārambhakatvena prakṛtir ucyate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6081: kāryaṃ yat yasya pariṇāmas tat tasya kāryaṃ vikāro vikāri kāraṇaṃ tayor vikāra-vikāriṇoḥ kārya-kāraṇayoḥ kartṛtve iti /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6082: athavā, ṣoḍāśa vikārāḥ kāryaṃ sapta prakṛti-vikṛtayaḥ kāraṇam tāny eva kārya-kāraṇāny ucyante teṣāṃ kartṛtve hetuḥ prakṛtir ucyate,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6084: puruṣaś ca saṃsārasya kāraṇaṃ yathā syāt tad ucyate - puruṣo jīvaḥ kṣetrajño bhoktā iti paryāyaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6085: sukha-duḥkhānāṃ bhogyānāṃ bhoktṛtve upalabdhṛtve hetur ucyate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6086: kathaṃ punar anena kārya-karaṇa-kartṛtvena sukha-duḥkha-bhoktṛtvena ca prakṛti-puruṣayoḥ saṃsāra-kāraṇatvam ucyate ?
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6087: ity atrocyate - kārya-karaṇa-sukha-duḥkha-rūpeṇa hetu-phalātmanā prakṛteḥ pariṇāmābhāve,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6090: yadā punaḥ kārya-karaṇa-sukha-duḥkha-svarūpeṇa hetu-phalātmanā pariṇatayā prakṛtyā bhogyayā puruṣasya tad-viparītasya bhoktṛtvenāvidyā-rūpaḥ saṃyogaḥ syāt,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6092: ato yat prakṛti-puruṣayoḥ kārya-karaṇa-kartṛtvena sukha-duḥkha-bhoktṛtvena ca saṃsāra-kāraṇatvam uktam, tad
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6093: yuktam / kaḥ punar ayaṃ saṃsāro nāma ?
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6095: puruṣasya ca sukha-duḥkhānāṃ saṃbhoktṛtvaṃ saṃsāritvam iti //BhGS_13.20// ==============================
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6097: yat puruṣasya sukha-duḥkhānāṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ saṃsāritvam ity uktaṃ tasya tat kiṃ-nimittam ity ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6098: puruṣaḥ prakṛti-stho hi bhuṅkte prakṛtijān guṇān /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6101: prakṛtāv avidyā-lakṣaṇāyāṃ kārya-karaṇa-rūpeṇa pariṇatāyāṃ sthitaḥ prakṛti-sthaḥ /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6105: prakṛtijān prakṛtito jātān sukha-duḥkha-mohākārābhivyaktān guṇān sukhī,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6109: satyām apy avidyāyāṃ sukha-duḥkha-moheṣu guṇeṣu bhujyamāneṣu yaḥ saṅga ātma-bhāvaḥ saṃsārasya sa pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ yasya puruṣasya janmanaḥ /

GSP33bhgsbh_u:6447: mūrtayo deha-saṃsthāna-lakṣaṇā mūrcchitāṅgāvayavā mūrtayaḥ saṃbhavanti yāḥ,

GSP33bhgsbh_u:6451: sattvaṃ rajas tama iti guṇāḥ prakṛti-saṃbhavāḥ /

GSP33bhgsbh_u:6456: tasmād guṇā iva nitya-para-tantrāḥ kṣetrajñaṃ praty avidyātmakatvāt kṣetrajñaṃ nibadhnantīva tam āspadīkṛtyātmānaṃ pratilabhanta iti nibadhnantīty ucyate /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6459: mahāntau samarthatarāv ājānu-pralambau bāhū yasya saḥ mahābāhuḥ he mahābāho /

GSP33bhgsbh_u:6462: nanu dehī na lipyate [Gītā 13.32] ity uktam /

GSP33bhgsbh_u:6492: dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārtheṣu karmasu sañjanaṃ tat-paratā karma-saṅgas tena nibadhnāti rajo dehinam //BhGS_14.7// ==============================
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6494: tamas tv ajñāna-jaṃ viddhi mohanaṃ sarva-dehinām /

GSP33bhgsbh_u:6531: lobhaḥ pravṛttir ārambhaḥ karmaṇām aśamaḥ spṛhā /
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6539: rajasi guṇe vivṛddha etāni liṅgāni jāyante /

GSP33bhgsbh_u:6607_1: dehotpatti-bīja-bhūtān janma-mṛtyu-jarā-duḥkhair janma ca mṛtyuś ca jarā ca duḥkhāni
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6607_2: ca janma-mṛtyu-jarā-duḥkhāni tair jīvann eva vimuktaḥ san vidvān amṛtam aśnute /

GSP33bhgsbh_u:6617: guṇātītasya lakṣaṇaṃ guṇātītatvopāyaṃ cārjunena pṛṣṭo 'smin śloke praśna-dvayārthaṃ prativacanaṃ bhagavān uvāca /
